issue.title: [C++] Implement autocasting in arithmetic compute kernels
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11078](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11078). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Arithmetic compute kernels should autocast arguments when possible similar to how dataset expressions autocast arguments (e.g. `arrow::compute::Add(float_array, int_array))` should cast the integer array to a float before adding if possible)
